# scm_device_redistribution_collector (Resource)

DeviceRedistributionCollector resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "scm_ethernet_interface" "layer3_setting" {
  name        = "$layer3_setting"
  comment     = "Managed by Terraform"
  folder      = "ngfw-shared"
  link_speed  = "auto"
  link_duplex = "full"
  link_state  = "auto"
  layer3 = {
    ip = [
      {
        name = "10.10.10.11"
      }
    ]
  }
}

resource "scm_device_redistribution_collector" "drc_settings" {
  folder = "ngfw-shared"
  redistribution_collector = {
    interface = scm_ethernet_interface.layer3_setting.name
  }
}
```

## Schema

### Optional

- `device` (String) The device in which the resource is defined

> ℹ️ **Note:** You must specify exactly one of `device`, `folder`, and `snippet`.
- `folder` (String) The folder in which the resource is defined

> ℹ️ **Note:** You must specify exactly one of `device`, `folder`, and `snippet`.
- `redistribution_collector` (Attributes) Redistribution collector (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--redistribution_collector))
- `snippet` (String) The snippet in which the resource is defined

> ℹ️ **Note:** You must specify exactly one of `device`, `folder`, and `snippet`.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) UUID of the resource
- `tfid` (String) The Terraform ID.

<a id="nestedatt--redistribution_collector"></a>
### Nested Schema for `redistribution_collector`

Optional:

- `interface` (String) User-ID collector interface


## Import

The following command can be used to import a resource not managed by Terraform:

```bash
terraform import scm_device_redistribution_collector.example folder:::id
```

or

```bash
terraform import scm_device_redistribution_collector.example :snippet::id
```

or

```bash
terraform import scm_device_redistribution_collector.example ::device:id
```

**Note:** Please provide just one of folder, snippet, or device for the import command.
